name: Super Spooky Spirits
description:
This is a work in progress, a retro 16bit era style homage to Dark Souls.  This is a work in progress, currently only including the first level of the game.

This can be played with gamepad or keyboard, but plays much smoother with a gamepad.

Super Spooky Spirits is released under the Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial-Sharealike 4 .0 International License.

(CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Main Theme :Night by Gigakoops (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)

Boss Music: Fighting Evil Mummies by Little Robot Sound Factory (CC BY 3.0)
